West, District Attorney, for State *384The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of July 2018 by NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc. to admit Jin Hee Lee Pro Hac Vice: *385"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of July 2018."
